   170‚Üímongodb = { version = "2.8", optional = true }
   171‚Üísqlx = { version = "0.7", features = ["runtime-tokio-rustls", "postgres", "uuid", "chrono", "json", "migrate", "rust_decimal"], optional = true }
   172‚Üíredis = { version = "0.24", features = ["tokio-comp", "connection-manager", "aio"], optional = true }
   173‚Üítokio-postgres = { version = "0.7", features = ["with-chrono-0_4", "with-uuid-1", "with-serde_json-1"] }
   174‚Üídeadpool-postgres = "0.12"
   175‚Üípostgres-types = { version = "0.2", features = ["derive"] }
   176‚Üí
   177‚Üí# Time and UUID
   178‚Üíchrono = { version = "0.4", features = ["serde"] }
   179‚Üíuuid = { version = "1.6", features = ["v4", "serde"] }
   180‚Üíhumantime = "2.1"
   181‚Üí
   182‚Üí# Cryptography
   183‚Üíhmac = "0.12"
   184‚Üísha2 = "0.10"
   185‚Üíbase64 = "0.21"
   186‚Üíhex = "0.4"
   187‚Üí
   188‚Üí# Logging and Tracing - Enhanced for verbose logging
   189‚Üítracing = "0.1"
   190‚Üítracing-subscriber = { version = "0.3", features = ["env-filter", "json", "fmt", "registry", "tracing-log", "ansi", "chrono"] }
   191‚Üítracing-log = "0.2"
   192‚Üítracing-appender = "0.2"
   193‚Üítracing-bunyan-formatter = "0.3"
   194‚Üí
   195‚Üí# Logging

   211‚Üí# Concurrency

   215‚Üí# Math and calculations - ÂçáÁ∫ßÂà∞ÊúÄÊñ∞ÁâàÊú¨ÊîØÊåÅÈáëËûçÁ∫ßÁ≤æÂ∫¶
   216‚Üírust_decimal = { version = "1.35", features = [
   217‚Üí    "serde", 
   218‚Üí    "serde_json",

   225‚Üírust_decimal_macros = "1.35"
   226‚Üístatrs = "0.17" # ÁªüËÆ°ÂàÜÊûê
   227‚Üíndarray = "0.15" # Êï∞ÁªÑËÆ°ÁÆó
   228‚Üírand = "0.8" # ÈöèÊú∫Êï∞ÁîüÊàê

   236‚Üí

   241‚Üípyo3 = { version = "0.21", features = ["auto-initialize", "abi3-py39"] }
   242‚Üípyo3-polars = { version = "0.15", optional = true }  # DataFrame conversion - updated for polars 0.39

   263‚Üíopt-level = 2  # ‰ªé3Êîπ‰∏∫2ÔºåÂπ≥Ë°°ÊÄßËÉΩÂíåÁºñËØëÊó∂Èó¥

[package]
name = "crypto-trading-engine"
version = "1.0.0"
edition = "2021"
authors = ["CryptoTrading Pro Team"]
description = "High-performance cryptocurrency trading engine built with Rust"

[lib]
name = "crypto_trading_engine"
crate-type = ["cdylib", "rlib"]

[features]
default = ["basic_trading", "websocket", "database"]
# Ê†∏ÂøÉ‰∫§ÊòìÂäüËÉΩ
basic_trading = []
# WebSocketÂÆûÊó∂Êï∞ÊçÆÊîØÊåÅ
websocket = []
# Êú¨Âú∞AIÊ®°ÂûãÊîØÊåÅ
local_models = []
# PolarsÊï∞ÊçÆÂ§ÑÁêÜÊîØÊåÅ
polars_support = ["polars", "pyo3-polars"]
# È´òÁ∫ßÂõûÊµãÂäüËÉΩ
advanced_backtest = []
# Êï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ìÊåÅ‰πÖÂåñÊîØÊåÅ
database = ["mongodb", "sqlx", "redis"]
# ÊÄßËÉΩÁõëÊéßÂíåÊåáÊ†á
monitoring = ["prometheus"]
# ÂÆåÊï¥ÂäüËÉΩÈõÜ(Áî®‰∫éÂºÄÂèëÂíåÊµãËØï)
full = ["basic_trading", "websocket", "local_models", "polars_support", "advanced_backtest", "database", "monitoring"]

[[bin]]
name = "trading-engine"
path = "src/main.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "minimal-engine"
path = "src/simple_main.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "standalone-test"
path = "src/standalone_test.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "unified-demo"
path = "src/unified_demo.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "test_exchanges"
path = "src/bin/test_exchanges.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "position-system-demo"
path = "src/bin/position_system_demo.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "api_server"
path = "src/bin/api_server.rs"

# [[bin]]
# name = "simple-api"
# path = "src/bin/simple_api.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "factor_test"
path = "src/bin/factor_test.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "api_server_v2"
path = "src/bin/api_server_v2.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "test_infrastructure"
path = "src/bin/test_infrastructure.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "test_infrastructure_only"
path = "src/bin/test_infrastructure_only.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "validate_infrastructure"
path = "src/bin/validate_infrastructure.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "test_openapi_modularization"
path = "src/bin/test_openapi_modularization.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "simple_api_server_with_metrics"
path = "src/bin/simple_api_server_with_metrics.rs"
required-features = ["monitoring"]

[[bin]]
name = "simple_metrics_server"
path = "src/bin/simple_metrics_server.rs"
required-features = ["monitoring"]

[[bin]]
name = "test_strategy"
path = "src/bin/test_strategy.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "metrics_server"
path = "src/bin/metrics_server.rs"
required-features = ["monitoring"]

[[bin]]
name = "test_database"
path = "src/bin/test_database.rs"
required-features = ["database"]

[[bin]]
name = "test_persistence"
path = "src/bin/test_persistence.rs"
required-features = ["database"]

[[bin]]
name = "test_pyo3_basic"
path = "src/bin/test_pyo3_basic.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "poc_qlib_ffi"
path = "src/bin/poc_qlib_ffi.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "ffi_benchmark"
path = "src/bin/ffi_benchmark.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "test_qlib_service"
path = "src/bin/test_qlib_service.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "integration_test_qlib"
path = "src/bin/integration_test_qlib.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "qlib_test_runner"
path = "src/bin/qlib_test_runner.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "qlib_metrics_exporter"
path = "src/bin/qlib_metrics_exporter.rs"

[dependencies]
# Async runtime
tokio = { version = "1.35", features = ["full"] }
tokio-tungstenite = { version = "0.21", features = ["rustls-tls-webpki-roots"] }
futures-util = "0.3"
futures = "0.3"

# Serialization
serde = { version = "1.0", features = ["derive"] }
serde_json = "1.0"
serde_yaml = "0.9"
toml = "0.8"
async-trait = "0.1"

# HTTP client and WebSocket
reqwest = { version = "0.11", features = ["json", "rustls-tls"] }
url = "2.4"
tungstenite = "0.21"

# Web server
actix-web = "4.4"
actix-cors = "0.7"
actix = "0.13"
actix-web-actors = "4.2"

# Database - ÂêØÁî®È´òÊÄßËÉΩÊï∞ÊçÆÊúçÂä°
mongodb = { version = "2.8", optional = true }
sqlx = { version = "0.7", features = ["runtime-tokio-rustls", "postgres", "uuid", "chrono", "json", "migrate", "rust_decimal"], optional = true }
redis = { version = "0.24", features = ["tokio-comp", "connection-manager", "aio"], optional = true }
tokio-postgres = { version = "0.7", features = ["with-chrono-0_4", "with-uuid-1", "with-serde_json-1"] }
deadpool-postgres = "0.12"
postgres-types = { version = "0.2", features = ["derive"] }

# Time and UUID
chrono = { version = "0.4", features = ["serde"] }
uuid = { version = "1.6", features = ["v4", "serde"] }
humantime = "2.1"

# Cryptography
hmac = "0.12"
sha2 = "0.10"
base64 = "0.21"
hex = "0.4"

# Logging and Tracing - Enhanced for verbose logging
tracing = "0.1"
tracing-subscriber = { version = "0.3", features = ["env-filter", "json", "fmt", "registry", "tracing-log", "ansi", "chrono"] }
tracing-log = "0.2"
tracing-appender = "0.2"
tracing-bunyan-formatter = "0.3"

# Logging
log = "0.4"
env_logger = "0.10"

# Enhanced logging utilities
flexi_logger = "0.27"
syslog-tracing = "0.2"

# Error handling
thiserror = "1.0"
anyhow = "1.0"

# Configuration
config = "0.14"
dotenv = "0.15"

# Concurrency
parking_lot = "0.12"
dashmap = "5.5"

# Math and calculations - ÂçáÁ∫ßÂà∞ÊúÄÊñ∞ÁâàÊú¨ÊîØÊåÅÈáëËûçÁ∫ßÁ≤æÂ∫¶
rust_decimal = { version = "1.35", features = [
    "serde", 
    "serde_json",
    "maths",           # È´òÁ∫ßÊï∞Â≠¶ËøêÁÆó
    "db-postgres",     # PostgreSQLÊîØÊåÅ 
    "db-tokio-postgres", # ÂºÇÊ≠•PostgreSQL
    "rkyv",           # È´òÊÄßËÉΩÂ∫èÂàóÂåñ
    "borsh",          # Âå∫ÂùóÈìæÂÖºÂÆπÂ∫èÂàóÂåñ
] }
rust_decimal_macros = "1.35"
statrs = "0.17" # ÁªüËÆ°ÂàÜÊûê
ndarray = "0.15" # Êï∞ÁªÑËÆ°ÁÆó
rand = "0.8" # ÈöèÊú∫Êï∞ÁîüÊàê

# Utilities
lazy_static = "1.4"
once_cell = "1.19"
num_cpus = "1.16"
sys-info = "0.9"
clap = { version = "4.4", features = ["derive"] }

# Parallel computing
rayon = "1.8"

# PyO3 for Python integration (Qlib) - Updated for Python 3.13 support
pyo3 = { version = "0.21", features = ["auto-initialize", "abi3-py39"] }
pyo3-polars = { version = "0.15", optional = true }  # DataFrame conversion - updated for polars 0.39

# ML dependencies for Qlib integration (ÂèØÈÄâ)
polars = { version = "0.39", features = ["lazy"], optional = true }

# Monitoring (ÂèØÈÄâ)
prometheus = { version = "0.13", optional = true }
regex = "1.11.1"
itertools = "0.12"

[dev-dependencies]
tempfile = "3.8"
rand = "0.8"
futures = "0.3"
sys-info = "0.9"
tokio-test = "0.4"
serde_json = "1.0"

[profile.release]
lto = "thin"  # ‰ªétrueÊîπ‰∏∫thinÂáèÂ∞ëÂÜÖÂ≠ò‰ΩøÁî®
codegen-units = 8  # Ëøõ‰∏ÄÊ≠•Â¢ûÂä†‰ª•ÂáèÂ∞ëÂÜÖÂ≠òÂéãÂäõ
opt-level = 2  # ‰ªé3Êîπ‰∏∫2ÔºåÂπ≥Ë°°ÊÄßËÉΩÂíåÁºñËØëÊó∂Èó¥
panic = "abort"
strip = true
incremental = true  # ÂêØÁî®Â¢ûÈáèÁºñËØë

# Optimized test profile for faster compilation
[profile.test]
opt-level = 2
debug = 1
incremental = true
debug-assertions = false
overflow-checks = false

# Benchmark profile for performance testing
[profile.bench]
opt-level = 3
lto = "thin"
codegen-units = 1
debug = false

[[bin]]
name = "standalone_qlib_test_runner"
path = "src/bin/standalone_qlib_test_runner.rs"

# ÊöÇÊó∂Á¶ÅÁî®ÊúâAPIÂÖºÂÆπÈóÆÈ¢òÁöÑÊÄßËÉΩÊµãËØï
# [[bin]]
# name = "performance_benchmark"
# path = "src/bin/performance_benchmark.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "test_complete_system"
path = "src/bin/test_complete_system.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "risk_test"
path = "src/bin/risk_test.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "simple_risk_test"
path = "src/bin/simple_risk_test.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "final_performance_test"
path = "src/bin/final_performance_test.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "simple_final_test"
path = "src/bin/simple_final_test.rs"

[profile.dev]
debug = 2
opt-level = 0
overflow-checks = true
incremental = true
debug-assertions = true
split-debuginfo = "unpacked"

# Debug configuration is handled by the default [profile.dev] above

     8‚Üí- **Ê≤âÊµ∏Âºè‰∫§ÊòìÁéØÂ¢É**ÔºöÂàõÈÄ†Á±ª‰ººBloomberg TerminalÁöÑ‰∏ì‰∏öÈáëËûçÂ∑•‰ΩúÁéØÂ¢ÉÔºåÂáèÂ∞ëÂπ≤Êâ∞Ôºå‰∏ìÊ≥®Êï∞ÊçÆÂàÜÊûê
     9‚Üí- **Êô∫ËÉΩÈÄÇÂ∫îÊÄßËÆæËÆ°**ÔºöÁïåÈù¢ËÉΩÂ§üÊ†πÊçÆÁî®Êà∑‰π†ÊÉØ„ÄÅÊï∞ÊçÆÁ±ªÂûãÂíåËÆæÂ§áÁâπÊÄßÊô∫ËÉΩË∞ÉÊï¥ÊòæÁ§∫ÊñπÂºè

    13‚Üí- **Ê¨°Ë¶ÅÁî®Êà∑**ÔºöÂä†ÂØÜË¥ßÂ∏ÅÊäïËµÑÁà±Â•ΩËÄÖ„ÄÅÈáëËûçÁ†îÁ©∂‰∫∫Âëò
    14‚Üí- **‰ΩøÁî®Âú∫ÊôØ**ÔºöÈïøÊó∂Èó¥Êï∞ÊçÆÁõëÊéß„ÄÅÁ≠ñÁï•ÂºÄÂèë‰∏éÊµãËØï„ÄÅÂ∏ÇÂú∫ÂàÜÊûêÁ†îÁ©∂

    18‚Üí2. **‰∏ÄËá¥ÊÄß**ÔºöÁªü‰∏ÄÁöÑËßÜËßâËØ≠Ë®ÄÂíå‰∫§‰∫íÊ®°Âºè
    19‚Üí3. **ÊïàÁéáÊÄß**ÔºöÊúÄÁü≠Ë∑ØÂæÑÂÆåÊàêÊ†∏ÂøÉÊìç‰Ωú
    20‚Üí4. **ÂèØÈù†ÊÄß**ÔºöÁ®≥ÂÆöÁöÑÂÆûÊó∂Êï∞ÊçÆÊõ¥Êñ∞ÂíåÁä∂ÊÄÅÂèçÈ¶à
    21‚Üí5. **ÂèØËÆøÈóÆÊÄß**ÔºöÊîØÊåÅËâ≤Áõ≤Áî®Êà∑ÔºåÁ¨¶ÂêàWCAG 2.1Ê†áÂáÜ
    22‚Üí

    36‚Üí

    38‚Üí```css
    39‚Üí/* Ê∂®Ë∑åËâ≤ÂΩ© */

    48‚Üí
    49‚Üí#### ËÉåÊôØËâ≤ÂΩ©
    50‚Üí```css

    52‚Üí--bg-primary: #0A0E17;           /* ‰∏ªËÉåÊôØ */

    62‚Üí
    63‚Üí#### ÊñáÂ≠óËâ≤ÂΩ©
    64‚Üí```css
    65‚Üí/* ÊñáÂ≠óÂ±ÇÁ∫ß */

    72‚Üí
    73‚Üí#### ÂäüËÉΩËâ≤ÂΩ©
    74‚Üí```css
    75‚Üí/* Áä∂ÊÄÅËâ≤ÂΩ© */
    76‚Üí--success-color: #10B981;        /* ÊàêÂäüÁä∂ÊÄÅ */

    87‚Üí
    88‚Üí### 2.2 Â≠ó‰ΩìËßÑËåÉ
    89‚Üí
    90‚Üí#### Â≠ó‰ΩìÊóè
    91‚Üí```css

   106‚Üí```css

## üìä Ê®°ÊãüÊï∞ÊçÆÊ®°Âºè

ÁïåÈù¢ÈªòËÆ§ÂêØÁî®**Ê®°ÊãüÊï∞ÊçÆÊ®°Âºè**ÔºåÊó†ÈúÄËøûÊé•ÂêéÁ´ØÂç≥ÂèØ‰ΩìÈ™åÊâÄÊúâÂäüËÉΩÔºö

### Ê®°ÊãüÊï∞ÊçÆÂåÖÊã¨Ôºö

### üîß ‰øÆÂ§çÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢òÔºö

1. **È°µÈù¢ÂàáÊç¢ÂäüËÉΩ** - ‰øÆÂ§ç‰∫ÜÂØºËà™ÂàáÊç¢ÈÄªËæëÔºåÁé∞Âú®ÁÇπÂáªÈ°∂ÈÉ®ËèúÂçïÂèØ‰ª•Ê≠£Â∏∏ÂàáÊç¢È°µÈù¢

### üìä Áé∞Âú®ÊÇ®ÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂà∞ÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπÔºö

#### **‰ª™Ë°®ÊùøÔºàDashboardÔºâ**

#### **Â∏ÇÂú∫Êï∞ÊçÆÔºàMarketÔºâ**

- ‚úÖ ‰ª∑Ê†º„ÄÅÊ∂®Ë∑å„ÄÅÊàê‰∫§ÈáèÁ≠âÂÆåÊï¥Êï∞ÊçÆ

#### **Á≠ñÁï•ÁÆ°ÁêÜÔºàStrategiesÔºâ**
- ‚úÖ 3‰∏™Á§∫‰æãÁ≠ñÁï•Â±ïÁ§∫
- ‚úÖ Á≠ñÁï•ÂàõÂª∫Ë°®Âçï
- ‚úÖ Á≠ñÁï•Áä∂ÊÄÅÊòæÁ§∫

#### **ÂõûÊµãÁ≥ªÁªüÔºàBacktestÔºâ**
- ‚úÖ ÂõûÊµãÈÖçÁΩÆË°®Âçï
- ‚úÖ Á≠ñÁï•ÈÄâÊã©‰∏ãÊãâÊ°Ü
- ‚úÖ ÂõûÊµãÁªìÊûúÂ±ïÁ§∫Âå∫Âüü

#### **AIÂàÜÊûêÔºàAI InsightsÔºâ**
- ‚úÖ AIÂàÜÊûêËØ∑Ê±ÇË°®Âçï
- ‚úÖ ÂàÜÊûêÁ±ªÂûãÈÄâÊã©
- ‚úÖ ÁªìÊûúÂ±ïÁ§∫Âå∫Âüü

### üöÄ ‰ΩøÁî®ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºö

1. **Âà∑Êñ∞È°µÈù¢**ÔºàF5ÊàñCtrl+RÔºâ‰ª•Âä†ËΩΩÊúÄÊñ∞‰øÆÂ§ç
2. **ÁÇπÂáªÈ°∂ÈÉ®ÂØºËà™**ÂàáÊç¢‰∏çÂêåÂäüËÉΩÈ°µÈù¢
3. **Êü•ÁúãÊéßÂà∂Âè∞**ÔºàF12ÔºâÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂà∞ËØ¶ÁªÜÁöÑË∞ÉËØï‰ø°ÊÅØ

### üí° ÁâπÂà´ËØ¥ÊòéÔºö

- ÁïåÈù¢Áé∞Âú®Â§Ñ‰∫é**ÂÆåÂÖ®Ê®°ÊãüÊ®°Âºè**ÔºåÊâÄÊúâÊï∞ÊçÆÈÉΩÊòØËá™Âä®ÁîüÊàêÁöÑ

- Âè≥‰∏äËßíÊòæÁ§∫"Êú™ËøûÊé•"ÊòØÊ≠£Â∏∏ÁöÑÔºå‰∏çÂΩ±Âìç‰ΩøÁî®

#!/bin/bash

echo "========================================"
echo "Âä†ÂØÜË¥ßÂ∏ÅÈáèÂåñÂàÜÊûêÁ≥ªÁªü - Ëá™Âä®ÂåñÊµãËØï"
echo "========================================"
echo ""

# Ê£ÄÊü•PythonÊòØÂê¶ÂÆâË£Ö
if ! command -v python3 &> /dev/null; then
    echo "ÈîôËØØ: Python3Êú™ÂÆâË£Ö"
    exit 1
fi

# Ëé∑ÂèñËÑöÊú¨ÊâÄÂú®ÁõÆÂΩï
DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"

echo "[1] ÂêØÂä®ÊµãËØïÊúçÂä°Âô®..."
cd "$DIR"
python3 -m http.server 8000 &
SERVER_PID=$!

echo "[2] Á≠âÂæÖÊúçÂä°Âô®ÂêØÂä®..."
sleep 3

echo "[3] ÊâìÂºÄÊµãËØïËøêË°åÂô®..."
if command -v xdg-open &> /dev/null; then
    xdg-open http://localhost:8000/test-runner.html
elif command -v open &> /dev/null; then
    open http://localhost:8000/test-runner.html
else
    echo "ËØ∑ÊâãÂä®ÊâìÂºÄ: http://localhost:8000/test-runner.html"
fi

echo ""
echo "========================================"
echo "ÊµãËØïÁéØÂ¢ÉÂ∑≤ÂêØÂä®ÔºÅ"
echo ""
echo "ÊµãËØïËøêË°åÂô®: http://localhost:8000/test-runner.html"
echo "‰∏ªÁïåÈù¢: http://localhost:8000/index.html"
echo ""
echo "Êåâ Ctrl+C ÂÖ≥Èó≠ÊµãËØïÁéØÂ¢É..."

# CoinGlass ÂéÜÂè≤Êï∞ÊçÆÊî∂ÈõÜÈ°πÁõÆ

## È°πÁõÆÊ¶ÇËø∞
Êú¨È°πÁõÆÁî®‰∫é‰ªé CoinGlass API ‰∏ãËΩΩ 2013Âπ¥Ëá≥‰ªäÁöÑÂä†ÂØÜ‰∫§ÊòìÊï∞ÊçÆÔºåÂπ∂‰øùÂ≠ò‰∏∫ Rust ÂèØÁõ¥Êé•ËØªÂèñÁöÑÊ†ºÂºè„ÄÇ

## Êï∞ÊçÆÂàÜÁ±ª
- **KÁ∫øÊï∞ÊçÆ**: ‰∏çÂêåÊó∂Èó¥Âë®ÊúüÁöÑ‰ª∑Ê†ºÊï∞ÊçÆ
- **‰∫§ÊòìÊâÄÊåÅ‰ªìÊï∞ÊçÆ**: ÂêÑ‰∫§ÊòìÊâÄÁöÑÊåÅ‰ªìÊÉÖÂÜµ  
- **ËµÑÈáëË¥πÁéáÊï∞ÊçÆ**: Ê∞∏Áª≠ÂêàÁ∫¶ÁöÑËµÑÈáëË¥πÁéá
- **ÁàÜ‰ªìÊï∞ÊçÆ**: Ê∏ÖÁÆóÊï∞ÊçÆ
- **Â∏ÇÂú∫Êï∞ÊçÆ**: Êï¥‰ΩìÂ∏ÇÂú∫ÊåáÊ†á

## ÁõÆÂΩïÁªìÊûÑ
```
historical_data/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ raw_data/           # ÂéüÂßã API ÂìçÂ∫î
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ processed_data/     # Â§ÑÁêÜÂêéÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆ
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ kline/         # KÁ∫øÊï∞ÊçÆ
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ funding_rate/  # ËµÑÈáëË¥πÁéá
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ liquidation/   # ÁàÜ‰ªìÊï∞ÊçÆ
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ open_interest/ # ÊåÅ‰ªìÊï∞ÊçÆ
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ market/        # Â∏ÇÂú∫Êï∞ÊçÆ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ metadata/          # Êï∞ÊçÆÂÖÉ‰ø°ÊÅØ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ scripts/           # ‰∏ãËΩΩËÑöÊú¨
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ README.md          # Êï∞ÊçÆËØ¥ÊòéÊñáÊ°£
```

## API ÈÖçÁΩÆ
- **Â•óÈ§êÁ±ªÂûã**: ÂàùÂàõ ($79/Êúà)
- **Ë∞ÉÁî®ÈôêÂà∂**: 80Ê¨°/ÂàÜÈíü
- **Êõ¥Êñ∞È¢ëÁéá**: ‚â§1ÂàÜÈíü

## ‰ΩøÁî®ÊñπÊ≥ï

message.content:
This session is being continued from a previous conversation that ran out of context. The conversation is summarized below:
Analysis:
Looking through the conversation chronologically:

1. Initial request: User asked me to analyze the current project and development goals, listing details. They indicated the project path and opened a file `fixed_trader.py` which suggested they were working with a trading system.

2. I analyzed the project structure at `E:\Analyticsplatform-main\Analyticsplatform-main\` and found it was a cryptocurrency quantitative analysis and strategy generation system with:
   - Rust backend engine
   - Python FastAPI
   - Frontend with Next.js
   - Historical data from CoinGlass API

3. User then requested to generate a local frontend test interface. I created a complete test interface with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript including mock data functionality.

4. User reported that several subsystems couldn't be opened/viewed and asked me to fix them. I debugged and fixed navigation, data loading, and chart initialization issues.

5. User then asked for test scripts to cover all functionality. I created a comprehensive automated test suite with 21 test cases.

6. User then mentioned they had collected historical trading data at `E:\historical data` and asked me to integrate it with the current module design. I explored the data structure (CoinGlass data from 2013-2025) and created integration modules.

7. User reported an error: "Êï∞ÊçÆÂä†ËΩΩÂ§±Ë¥•: mainChart.addCandlestickSeries is not a function" and asked for functional testing of the historical data viewer page. I fixed the chart API errors.

The conversation shows a progression from project analysis ‚Üí frontend interface creation ‚Üí bug fixing ‚Üí test suite development ‚Üí historical data integration ‚Üí chart API bug fixing.

Summary:
1. **Primary Request and Intent:**
   - Analyze the cryptocurrency quantitative analysis system project structure and development goals
   - Generate a local frontend test interface for testing all system functionality
   - Fix issues preventing subsystems from being opened/viewed properly
   - Create comprehensive test scripts covering all features with automated testing
   - Integrate collected historical trading data (from E:\historical data) with the current system modules
   - Fix chart library API errors in the historical data viewer and perform functional testing

2. **Key Technical Concepts:**
   - Cryptocurrency quantitative trading analysis system
   - Rust high-performance backend engine
   - Python FastAPI for auxiliary services
   - Next.js/React frontend with TypeScript
   - TradingView Lightweight Charts library
   - WebSocket real-time data streaming
   - CoinGlass historical data (2013-2025)
   - Data types: K-line, funding rates, liquidation, open interest, long/short ratios
   - Mock data mode for testing without backend
   - Automated testing suite with visual feedback

3. **Files and Code Sections:**
   - **E:\Analyticsplatform-main\Analyticsplatform-main\README.md**
     - Main project documentation describing the system as a professional crypto quantitative analysis platform
     - Important for understanding project scope and architecture
   
   - **E:\Analyticsplatform-main\Analyticsplatform-main\test-interface\index.html**
     - Main test interface HTML structure with 5 functional pages
     - Created to provide visual testing interface for all system features
   
   - **E:\Analyticsplatform-main\Analyticsplatform-main\test-interface\app.js**
     - Fixed initialization and page switching issues
     - Key fixes:
     ```javascript
     // Fixed initialization with try-catch
     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
         console.log('È°µÈù¢Âä†ËΩΩÂÆåÊàêÔºåÂºÄÂßãÂàùÂßãÂåñ...');
         try {
             initializeApp();
             setupEventListeners();
             startClock();
             console.log('Âä†ËΩΩÊ®°ÊãüÊï∞ÊçÆ...');
             initializeMockData();
             updateConnectionStatus(true);
         } catch (error) {
             console.error('ÂàùÂßãÂåñÈîôËØØ:', error);
             showToast('error', 'ÁïåÈù¢ÂàùÂßãÂåñÂ§±Ë¥•: ' + error.message);
         }
     });
     ```
   
   - **E:\Analyticsplatform-main\Analyticsplatform-main\test-interface\test-suite.js**
     - Comprehensive test suite with 21 automated test cases
     - Covers UI loading, navigation, data display, forms, API, performance, security
   
   - **E:\Analyticsplatform-main\Analyticsplatform-main\test-interface\historical-data-loader.js**
     - Data loading module for CoinGlass historical data integration
     - Supports 10 data types with preprocessing and analysis capabilities
   
   - **E:\Analyticsplatform-main\Analyticsplatform-main\test-interface\historical-data-viewer.html**
     - Visualization interface for historical data analysis
     - Fixed chart API errors:
     ```javascript
     // Fixed: Changed from mainChart.remove() to proper series cleanup
     if (mainChart._series) {
         mainChart._series.forEach(s => mainChart.removeSeries(s));
     }
     mainChart._series = [];
     ```

4. **Errors and Fixes:**
   - **Navigation/Subsystem Access Issues:**
     - Error: Users couldn't open/view subsystems
     - Fix: Added proper page switching logic, automatic mock data loading, and error handling
   
   - **Chart Initialization Errors:**
     - Error: Charts not displaying properly
     - Fix: Added delayed initialization with try-catch blocks
   
   - **"mainChart.addCandlestickSeries is not a function" Error:**
     - Error: Chart library API method not found
     - Fix: Corrected chart cleanup method from `mainChart.remove()` to properly removing series
     - Added error handling around chart operations

5. **Problem Solving:**
   - Successfully created a complete frontend testing interface with mock data support
   - Implemented automated testing suite with visual progress tracking
   - Integrated historical trading data from CoinGlass (2013-2025) with proper data loading and visualization
   - Fixed multiple JavaScript runtime errors related to chart initialization and data display

6. **All User Messages:**
